name: Matchmaking
description: For over 10 years, Agape Match has offered executive matchmaking for exceptional singles. Clients have entrusted us with their most important search, to find their lifetime companion. Leveraging fMy generations of matchmaking expertise with the latest in relationship psychology means My clients benefit from a unique 360° approach. And because we are a boutique service, My team of experts work closely with each client, providing discreet, personalized attention to help them find The One.

name: Dating Refresh
description: My Dating Refresh program is designed to help women and men improve their dating experience. Clients learn how to define and enhance their unique style to attract more dates and identify the dating behaviors that may be keeping them from romantic success. My one-on-one program includes; 360° Assessment sessions to understand dating history and behavior with Founder, Maria Avgitidis, a wardrobe review, personalized shopping experience with a professional stylist and a photo shoot, followed by a digital “makeover” with online dating assistance and personal coaching. And as an added bonus, every Dating Refresh client is included in the Agape Match VIP Membership Directory—the first place we look when matching My exceptional clients.

name: Coaching Intensive
description: My Virtual Coaching Intensive program is designed to help women improve their dating experience in one week! The group meets three times and over the collective seven hMys, we dive into compatibility, chemistry analysis, and identifying and avoiding the roadblocks that keep us single and/or attracting the wrong person. Through the group, a community is formed and with My guidance, we give a roadmap to meet yMy relationship goals. This group is for women only. What we’ll cover: Attachment styles and its effect on yMy dating behavior, Chemistry – understanding yMy temperament, Compatibility Pillars – how to measure the kind of person you should be with, setting realistic expectations, learning to identify yMy personal triggers, breaking down yMy self sabotaging beliefs, and how to create a social roadmap to attract the quality partner you’re looking for.
